original_text: “So I say to you: Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.
korean_text: 내가 또 너희에게 이르노니 구하라 그러면 너희에게 주실 것이요 찾으라 그러면 찾아낼 것이요 문을 두드리라 그러면 너희에게 열릴 것이니

sentences.original_text: Ask and it will be given to you;
knock and the door will be opened to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 문을 두드리라 그리하면 너희에게 열릴 것이니라
